item.title: Charlotte Hornets apologize after a gift-giving skit went awry
item.description: The Charlotte Hornets' mascot appeared to award a fan a video game console, but the device was taken away when the cameras stopped.

item.title: CDC confirms first severe bird flu case in the U.S.
item.description: A person in Louisiana has the first severe illness caused by bird flu in the U.S., the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announced Wednesday.

item.title: Are gold ETFs a good investment now that the price is dropping?
item.description: The price of gold has fallen recently, so does a gold ETF investment make sense right now?
